revised_title: Enzymes Involved in the Decomposition of Glucose and Mannitol by Bacillus coli communis
tldr: The author investigates the enzymes responsible for the decomposition of glucose and mannitol in Bacillus coli communis. They find that the selected strain produces acid but not gas from glucose and mannitol, and that the enzymes involved in this process differ from those in the normal strain.
